text: Bose uko ari babiri baciye birukira kumuryango, wamukenyezi aca amutaburirako impuzu yiwe imugongo baca batubirana n’umutambukanyi wiwe imbere y’urwo rugi, uyo mupfasoni aca avuga ati:- nta mpembo y’uwugomba kugira amabi nkayo n’umutambukanyi wawe atari uko yobohwa mw’ibohero canke agahabwa ibihano bibabaza cane
